sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
An exposition on the whole booke of Solomons song, commonly called the canticles. Wherein the text is explained and usefull observations raised thereupon. / By John Robotham, preacher of the gospel. Robotham, John, fl. 1654.
[8], 772, [20] p.
Printed by Matthew Simmons, in Aldersgate-street next doore to the guilded-Lyon, London : 1651.
With a table of Scriptures, and a final leaf apologizing for errors. Annotation on Thomason copy: "August.8.". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
An exposition on the whole booke of Solomons song, commonly called the canticles. Wherein the text is explained and usefull observations raised thereupon. / By John Robotham, preacher of the gospel. Robotham, John, fl. 1654.
[8], 772, [20] p.
Printed by Matthew Simmons, in Aldersgate-street next doore to the guilded-Lyon, London : 1651.
With a table of Scriptures, and a final leaf apologizing for errors. Annotation on Thomason copy: "August.8.". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
